text: Hugh Sinclair is an Australian professional rugby union player for the New South Wales Waratahs in Super Rugby. His position is flanker, and can also play number eight. ==Career== He made his debut for the Rebels against the Sharks as a replacement for Jake Schatz in a 9-9 draw for the Rebels.
